data.description: Rule to match the contens of a FILE_ID.DIZ
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will provide the functionality to search through an
    archive's (using Archive::Zip) FILE_ID.DIZ.

    a FILE_ID.DIZ, generally used with BBS', is a file included in a
    ZIP archive providing a short description of its contents.
